text: The Second Bulgarian Empire was a medieval Bulgarian state that existed between 1185 and 1396 and succeeded the First Bulgarian Empire.R. J. Crampton, A Concise History of Bulgaria, Cambridge University Press, 2005, , p. 24. The Second Bulgarian Empire reached its golden age under Tsars Kaloyan and Ivan Asen II before being slowly conquered by the Ottomans in the late 14th century. == References == Category:Government of Bulgaria Category:Establishments in Bulgaria Category:1185 establishments Category:Former monarchies of Europe
title: Second Bulgarian Empire
